Application Gateway

Use HTTP load balancing and delivery control to build highly scalable websites.

Apply for trial Purchase now

By providing HTTP load balancing and delivery control, Azure Application Gateway permits you to build highly expandable and highly available websites.

Pricing Details

Application Gateway

We charge the Application Gateway based on the settings and the quantity of time providing the gateway, as well as the amount of data processed by the application gateway.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimation is based on a usage of 744 hours every month.

* When the created Application Gateway types support multiple instances, charging will be made by the front end instance quantity/hours of the gateway, rather than by the instance quantity actually used in the back end.
Application Gateway Types Basic Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) Application Gateway
Small-sized ¥0.16 each gateway/hour (about ¥119.04 /month) Not available
Medium-sized ¥0.45 each gateway/hour (about ¥334.80 /month) ¥1.80 every gateway/hour (about ¥1339.20 /month)
Large-sized ¥2.01 every gateway/hour (about ¥1495.44 /month) ¥6.38 every gateway/hour (about ¥4746.72 /month)

Data Processing

The charges for data processing are based on the amount of data processed by the application gateway.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimation is based on a usage of 744 hours every month.
Data Processing Small-sized Medium-sized Large-sized
Front 10TB/month ¥0.05/GB Free Free
Rear 30TB(10 - 40 TB)/month ¥0.05/GB ¥0.04/GB Free
Over 40TB/month ¥0.05/GB ¥0.04/GB ¥0.02/GB

Incoming Data Transmission

(namely, data transmission into the Azure Data Center): data transmitted into the Azure Data Center via Application Gateway will be charged at the standard Data Transmission Rate.

Outgoing Data Transmission

(namely, data transmission from Azure Data Center): data transmitted from Azure Data Center via application gateway will be charged at the standard Data Transmission Rate.

FAQs

Expand All
  • Is a usage of less than one hour charged for one hour?

    Yes. Less than an hour will be charged for one hour.

  • Is the service level agreement provided only to the Application Cloud service with only one instance? How about a small-sized Application Gateway?

    No. The small-sized Application Gateway is mainly used for development/testing purposes. Running production workloads on a small-sized Application Gateway may exceed the capacity of small instances. Application Gateway supports deploying one or several instances in the same cloud service. Owing to a lack of high availability, running the Application Gateway service with only one instance is not recommended.

Marketing Regions

Application Gateway services are available in the following regions:

Territories Regions
Mainland China China East Data Center, China North Data Center

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need any help, please access Azure Support and select self-help services or any other methods to contact us for support.

We guarantee every Application Gateway service with two or more medium- and large-sized instances is available at least 99.9% of the time. We don’t provide service level agreements for the Application Gateway service with only one instance or a small instance. If you want to learn about the details of our server level agreement, please access the Service Level Agreement page.
